channel.title: Nsec-2021 Badge on AlrikRr's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Nsec-2021 Badge on AlrikRr's Blog

item.title: Flag #9 - Tom's Hut part2
item.description: If you want to fully understand this post I can only recommand you to read the previous one (Flag 8 part1) RE102 Reverse Like the previous one, the architecture is Xtensa, but this time I already have the right module for Ghidra ! Using Ghidra I’m doing the import and the analysis of the binary. App Main The app_main function is very similar to RE101, so this time let’s jump on the verify function !

item.title: Flag #8 - Tom's Hut part1
item.description: The next 2 Flags are binary reverse, I was very very rusty on this one … Wi-Fi Join So, this challenge is accessible from Tom’s Hut after you have joined a Wi-Fi network ! To join a Wi-Fi network, you need to access the serial port using screen (check Chall 7 !) and use the following command: You should receive an IP, you can now go to Tom’s Hut and see the following message !

item.title: Flag #7 - Reboot
item.description: I was also lucky on this one. tty CLI After connecting to the device using the serial port with the screen command: sudo screen /dev/ttyUSB0 115200 If you can¬¥t see your ttyUSB, try using dmesg after connecting the badge on your computer. And also check your /dev/ folder Reboot ! As you can see, behind the badge, there is a reboot button, and I keep pressing it by mistake! However, after looking at the terminal, I saw the full message and a small help menu before the shell!

item.title: Flag #5 - Punk Down
item.description: Okay for this one I don’t have the reference but I managed to found it by accident ! It’s actually the second one I found during my journey. Punk Guy I was playing around the place and speak to this Punk Guy right here During the conversation, I found the flag by accident by pressing the Down Button Flag 5 The flag is FLAG-KLJV490uhkEJF28

item.title: Flag #1 - Welcome
item.description: Hello everyone ! It’s been a while since my last post but I’m still alive no worries üòÅ Today I’m gonna post some write-up for the NorthSec 2021 Badge CTF ! I purchase the badge last year and din’t have time to play with it so here I am ! It’s actually my first CTF Badge and I hope im going to fine all the flags ! Device Here is a full spec of the nsec badge : available here
